title: TargetInputField
description: An association between a TestCoverageTarget and a specific input field of the target artifact, defining which InputSpacePartition applies to that field and documenting its coverage relevance per IEEE 829-2008 test case specification.

fieldRef.description: ID of the referenced field element in the API layer (e.g., an API parameter) or Data Model layer (e.g., a data-model property)

partitionRef.description: ID of the testing.inputspacepartition that defines the equivalence classes or boundary values for this input field.

relevance.description: Whether this field must be included in test case input specifications
